verses.verse: Then Elihu <WH453> continued <WH3254> and said, <WH559>
"Wait <WH3803> for me a little, <WH2191> and I will show <WH2331> you That there is yet <WH5750> more <WH5750> to be said <WH4405> in God's behalf.
"I will fetch <WH5375> my knowledge <WH1843> from afar, <WH7350> And I will ascribe <WH5414> righteousness <WH6664> to my Maker. <WH6466>
"For truly <WH551> my words <WH4405> are not false; <WH8267> One who <WH8549> is perfect <WH8549> in knowledge <WH1844> is with you.
"Behold, <WH2005> God <WH410> is mighty <WH3524> but does not despise <WH3988> [any;] [He is] mighty <WH3524> in strength <WH3581> of understanding. <WH3820>
"He does not keep <WH2421> the wicked <WH7563> alive, <WH2421> But gives <WH5414> justice <WH4941> to the afflicted. <WH6041>

"He does not withdraw <WH1639> His eyes <WH5869> from the righteous; <WH6662> But with kings <WH4428> on the throne <WH3678> He has seated <WH3427> them forever, <WH5331> and they are exalted. <WH1361>
"And if <WH518> they are bound <WH631> in fetters, <WH9108> And are caught <WH3920> in the cords <WH9112> of affliction, <WH6040>
Then He declares <WH5046> to them their work <WH6467> And their transgressions, <WH6588> that they have magnified <WH1396> themselves.
"And He opens <WH1540> their ear <WH241> to instruction, <WH4148> And commands <WH559> that they return <WH7725> from evil. <WH205>
"If <WH518> they hear <WH8085> and serve <WH5647> [Him,] They shall end <WH3615> their days <WH3117> in prosperity, <WH9185> And their years <WH8141> in pleasures. <WH5273>
"But if <WH518> they do not hear, <WH8085> they shall perish <WH5674> by the sword, <WH2719> And they shall die <WH1478> without <WH1097> knowledge. <WH1847>
"But the godless <WH2611> in heart <WH3820> lay <WH7760> up anger; <WH639> They do not cry <WH7768> for help <WH7768> when <WH3588> He binds <WH631> them.
"They die <WH4191> in youth, <WH5290> And their life <WH9130> [perishes] among the cult <WH6945> prostitutes. <WH6945>
"He delivers <WH2502> the afflicted <WH6041> in their affliction, <WH6040> And opens <WH1540> their ear <WH241> in [time of] oppression. <WH3906>

"Then indeed, <WH637> He enticed <WH5496> you from the mouth <WH6310> of distress, <WH9496> Instead <WH8478> of it, a broad <WH7338> place <WH7338> with no <WH3808> constraint; <WH4164> And that which <WH5183> was set <WH5183> on your table <WH7979> was full <WH4390> of fatness. <WH1880>
"But you were full <WH4390> of judgment <WH1779> on the wicked; <WH7563> Judgment <WH1779> and justice <WH4941> take <WH8551> hold <WH8551> [of you.]
"[Beware] lest <WH6435> wrath <WH2534> entice <WH5496> you to scoffing; <WH5607> And do not let the greatness <WH7230> of the ransom <WH3724> turn <WH5186> you aside. <WH5186>
"Will your riches <WH9592> keep <WH6186> [you] from distress, <WH9496> Or all <WH3605> the forces <WH3981> of [your] strength <WH3581>?
"Do not long <WH7602> for the night, <WH3915> When people <WH5971> vanish <WH5927> in their place. <WH8478>
"Be careful, <WH8104> do not turn <WH6437> to evil; <WH205> For you have preferred <WH977> this <WH2088> to affliction. <WH6040>
"Behold, <WH2005> God <WH410> is exalted <WH7682> in His power; <WH3581> Who <WH4310> is a teacher <WH4175> like <WH3644> Him?
"Who <WH4310> has appointed <WH6485> Him His way, <WH1870> And who <WH4310> has said, <WH559> 'Thou hast done <WH6466> wrong <WH9390>'?
"Remember <WH2142> that you should exalt <WH7679> His work, <WH6467> Of which <WH834> men <WH376> have sung. <WH7891>
"All <WH3605> men <WH120> have seen <WH2372> it; Man <WH120> beholds <WH5027> from afar. <WH7350>
"Behold, <WH2005> God <WH410> is exalted, <WH7689> and we do not know <WH3045> [Him;] The number <WH4557> of His years <WH8141> is unsearchable. <WH3808> <WH2714>
"For He draws <WH1639> up the drops <WH9325> of water, <WH4325> They distill <WH2212> rain <WH4306> from the mist, <WH108>
Which <WH834> the clouds <WH7834> pour <WH5140> down, <WH5140> They drip <WH7491> upon man <WH120> abundantly. <WH7227>
"Can anyone understand <WH995> the spreading <WH4666> of the clouds, <WH5645> The thundering <WH8663> of His pavilion <WH5521>?
"Behold, <WH2005> He spreads <WH6566> His lightning <WH216> about <WH5921> Him, And He covers <WH3680> the depths <WH8328> of the sea. <WH3220>
"For by these He judges <WH1777> peoples; <WH5971> He gives <WH5414> food <WH400> in abundance. <WH3527>
"He covers <WH3680> [His] hands <WH3709> with the lightning, <WH216> And commands <WH6680> it to strike <WH6293> the mark. <WH6293>
"Its noise <WH7452> declares <WH5046> His presence; <WH5921> The cattle <WH4735> also, <WH637> concerning <WH5921> what is coming <WH5927> up.
